title: MercadoLibre lays off 119 people due to its AI expansion, Folha reports
description:
E-commerce firm MercadoLibre, which operates across Latin America, laid off 119 people in a move related to its artificial intelligence expansion, Brazilian newspaper Folha de S. Paulo said.

title: Meta to cut about 10% of employees in Reality Labs business
description: Meta plans to cut about 10% of the employees in its Reality Labs division who work on products including the metaverse, as the company shifts priorities to build next-generation artificial intelligence.
content: SAN FRANCISCO — Meta plans to cut about 10% of the employees in its Reality Labs division who work on products including the metaverse, according to three people with knowledge of the discussions, as the company shifts priorities to build next-genera... [3755 chars]

title: Google's corporate parent joins $4 trillion club as investors continue to bet on AI breakthroughs
description: Google parent Alphabet Inc. on Monday became the fourth Big Tech powerhouse to be valued at $4 trillion, a once seemingly unfathomable milestone that’s become more like a rite of passage amid an artificial intelligence arms race

title: AI helps fuel new era of medical self-testing
description: Beyond smart watches and rings, artificial intelligence is being used to make self-testing for major diseases more readily available—from headsets that detect early signs of Alzheimer's to an iris-scanning app that helps spot cancer.
content:
Beyond smart watches and rings, artificial intelligence is being used to make self-testing for major diseases more readily available—from headsets that detect early signs of Alzheimer's to an iris-scanning app that helps spot cancer.
